about_the_game:
Clear the Night Sky!


Puzzle Versus Action! In Scramble Star Crossing, embark on a stellar action-puzzle adventure! Engage in local multiplayer battles with 2-4 players. Hone your skills as a Star Clearer in our many single-player modes, clearing colorful stars in the night sky. Or unravel the mysteries of the world and its inhabitants with a huge cast of characters in Story Mode, and compete against friends!

About this Game


Scramble Star Crossing is an action-packed puzzle versus game where you match stars to clear the skies. As a Star Clearer of the planet Nesson, you are given the ability to float and manipulate the colorful star-storms that endlessly inhabit the airspace of your planet. Star Clearing is both an occupation, and a sporting event! Compete against rival Star Clearers to become the best and most prestigious.



In Story Mode embark along the story of Alice, a brand new Star Clearer fresh from the Academy. Compete in the Annual Star Clearer’s Competition, facing off against an eclectic cast, all while discovering the origins of the rainbow star-storms and the history of humanity’s journey to Nesson.

Versus and Team Battle


Ready to show your friends how skilled you are? Compete in local and online matches filled with action-puzzle intensity. In Versus Mode, sparks fly as combatants send confounding effects to each other in an attempt to make their adversaries top out. In Quota Mode, be the fastest to clear a number of stars to be crowned champion. And in Time Trial Mode, compete purely for points: those who make the biggest combos and use their abilities to their full potential will come out on top!

Main Features

  • Competitive Multiplayer
  • Local Multiplayer
  • Various Multiplayer Modes
  • Over 12 Playable Characters
  • Narrative Story Modes
  • 4-Player Team Matches
  • Time and Quota Trial Leaderboards

name: Scramble Star Crossing

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GTX+ (1GB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 resolution preferred
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 resolution preferred
